name: dice or trinket bags
notes:
these small drawstring bags are about 5" tall and 4" across when laid flat. they are the perfect size to use as a dice bag, or to hold any trinkets or small items. 

the pattern includes 3 different styles, each following the same pattern but using a different stitch in alternating rows. one uses rows of double crochet, another uses crossed double crochet, and the last uses the bead stitch.

the top has a row of chain spaces to create eyelets to thread the drawstring through.
